meaningMnemonic: Something that is <kanji>public</kanji>ly <kanji>manage</kanji>d is something that is <vocabulary>public</vocabulary> aka <vocabulary>government run</vocabulary>. Compare this to 私営 which is private / privately run.
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word, which usually means on'yomi readings from the kanji. If you know the readings of your kanji you'll know how to read this as well.
